com.facebook.buck.rules.coercer

Interface TypeCoercer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - resulting type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildConfigFieldsTypeCoercer, BuildTargetTypeCoercer, CollectionTypeCoercer, ConstraintTypeCoercer, EitherTypeCoercer, EnumTypeCoercer, FlavorTypeCoercer, FrameworkPathTypeCoercer, IdentityTypeCoercer, LabelTypeCoercer, LeafTypeCoercer, ListTypeCoercer, LogLevelTypeCoercer, ManifestEntriesTypeCoercer, MapTypeCoercer, NeededCoverageSpecTypeCoercer, NumberTypeCoercer, OcamlSourceTypeCoercer, OptionalTypeCoercer, PairTypeCoercer, PathTypeCoercer, PatternMatchedCollectionTypeCoercer, PatternTypeCoercer, SetTypeCoercer, SortedMapTypeCoercer, SortedSetTypeCoercer, SourceListTypeCoercer, SourcePathTypeCoercer, SourceWithFlagsListTypeCoercer, SourceWithFlagsTypeCoercer, UriTypeCoercer, VersionMatchedCollectionTypeCoercer, VersionTypeCoercer

    public interface TypeCoercer<T>
    Class defining an interpretation of some dynamically typed Java object as a specific class. Used to coerce JSON parser output from BUCK files into the proper type to populate Description rule args.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TypeCoercer.Traversal

    • Method Detail

      • getOutputClass

        Class<T> getOutputClass()

      • hasElementClass

        boolean hasElementClass(Class<?>... types)
        Returns whether the leaf nodes of this type coercer outputs value that is an instance of the given class or its subclasses. Does not match non-leaf nodes like Map or List.

      • traverse

        void traverse(T object,
              TypeCoercer.Traversal traversal)
        Traverse an object guided by this TypeCoercer. #{link Traversal#traverse} function will be called once for the object. If the object is a collection or map, it will also recursively traverse all elements of the map.

      • coerce

        T coerce(CellPathResolver cellRoots,
         ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
         Path pathRelativeToProjectRoot,
         Object object)
  throws CoerceFailedException
        Throws:
        CoerceFailedException - Input object cannot be coerced into the given type.
